static java.lang.Object convertValueToIdentifierType(org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsDomainClass grailsDomainClass, java.lang.Object idValue, org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService conversionService)
Converts an id value to the appropriate type for a domain class.
Parameters:
grailsDomainClass - a GrailsDomainClass
idValue - an value to be converted
Returns:
the idValue parameter converted to the type that grailsDomainClass expects its identifiers to be
